AND A.BTBS_SQ = #{btbsSq}

AND REG_DTTM BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate},' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND MEM_GEN = #{memGen}
AND BTBS_SQ = 1
AND BTBS_SQ != 1

GROUP BY AGE
